translations: 法西斯主义的支持者（Fascist 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: My grandfather fought against the Fascists in Spain.
sentences.translation: 我的祖父曾经在西班牙与法西斯分子作战。

sentences.sentence: War of aggression launched by fascists has brought scourges to mankind but also enlightened people throughout the world.
sentences.translation: 法西斯发动的侵略战争给人类带来了浩劫，也教育了世界人民。

sentences.sentence: Fascists is the most ruthless enemy of the people.
sentences.translation: 大部分的人都穿得朴素。
